skillTree.name: Invulnerable Through Change
skillTree.description: With just a wave of the hand, projectiles fired at this servant of Tchar are turned from sharp and pointy to soft and entirely harmless.

skillTree.name: Hates Nurgle
skillTree.description: Perhaps it is the Fly Lord's apparent nonchalance that enrages Tzeentch so? Whatever the reason, the Great Game's greatest player, and his greatest servant, have an adversary on which to focus their ire.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Nurglish factions
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Nurglish factions

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.name: Barded Chaos Steed (Mount)
skillTree.description: The dread steeds of Chaos are more than mere horses, but creatures tainted by Daemon blood, said to be gifts from the Dark Gods themselves.

skillTree.name: Manticore (Mount)
skillTree.description: Manticores are huge leonine beasts with the wings of a giant bat and tails the drip with poison. They are the fiercest of all Chaotic mounts.

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

ui_effects.description: Effect increases proportional to the number of friendly units in range
Summons a unit of Blue Horrors

skillTree.name: Lord of Forbidden Lore
skillTree.description: The Sorcerer has committed to memory many a grimoire and graven tome, giving him extensive knowledge of hexes, cantrips and spells.

skillTree.name: Just as Planned
skillTree.description: When the future is like an open book, predicting any enemy movement becomes just an easy and barely entertaining task.

skillTree.name: Otherwordly Presence
skillTree.description: The Warlord has made countless pacts with denizens of the warp. These empyric entities whisper to him constantly, granting him visions of thetwisting skeins of fate.

skillTree.name: Melkoth's Mystifying Miasma
skillTree.description: The caster weaves a confounding fog that numbs and deludes enemies, causing them to stumble and stagger.

ui_effects.description: Strong vs 25 men unit or above
Strong vs 25 men unit or above

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Melkoth's Mystifying Miasma"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Melkoth's Mystifying Miasma Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Melkoth's Mystifying Miasma Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Smoke & Mirrors
skillTree.description: A conjured shadow is just as obfuscating as a real one - the Shadow Wizard is master or mistress of the 'concealing' arts.

skillTree.name: The Enfeebling Foe
skillTree.description: When cast, this spell enfeebles enemy minds; they feel the crushing weight of reality bearing down upon them.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "The Enfeebling Foe"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Enfeebling Foe Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "The Enfeebling Foe Upgraded"

skillTree.name: The Withering
skillTree.description: The Wizard destroys their enemies from within, corroding foes' minds with doubt and crisis.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "The Withering"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Withering Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "The Withering Upgraded"

skillTree.name: The Penumbral Pendulum
skillTree.description: A spectral pendulum is summoned by the Wizard. On command, it swings, razor sharp and with lethal speed, through the foe.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Penumbral Pendulum"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "The Penumbral Pendulum Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "The Penumbral Pendulum Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Pit of Shades
skillTree.description: The spellcaster opens a vortex leading into the Pit. Anything caught within it will be lost forever.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Pit of Shades"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Pit of Shades Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Pit of Shades Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Okkam's Mindrazor
skillTree.description: The supernatural solution is often the best; weapons materialise before the caster's allies, allowing them to slice through flesh, soul, and consciousness.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Okkam's Mindrazor"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Okkam's Mindrazor Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Okkam's Mindrazor Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.name: Martial Mastery (Skill Dump)
skillTree.description: When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)

skillTree.name: Defensive Dedication (Skill Dump)
skillTree.description: Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)

skillTree.name: Glorious Fate
skillTree.description: Lowliest tribesmen and great warriors alike follow this man wherever the Changer of Ways guides him.

skillTree.name: Craving for Power
skillTree.description: There is never lack of fools who believe Tzeentch will gift them with something else than madness and mutation.

effects.description:
Melee Attack: +2 for Marauders, Tribesmen, Riders of Tzeentch, and Initiates units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Defence: +4 for Marauders, Tribesmen, Riders of Tzeentch, and Initiates units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Attack: +4 for Marauders, Tribesmen, Riders of Tzeentch, and Initiates units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Defence: +8 for Marauders, Tribesmen, Riders of Tzeentch, and Initiates units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Mindless Slaves
skillTree.description: Althought they lack any kind of intellect, Tzeentch can find them useful.

effects.description:
Charge Bonus: +6 for Chaos Fury, Screamer, Spawn, Forsaken, and Warp Stalker units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +4% for Chaos Fury, Screamer, Spawn, Forsaken, and Warp Stalker units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +8% for Chaos Fury, Screamer, Spawn, Forsaken, and Warp Stalker units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Unnatural Flame
skillTree.description: Being made of twisted magic, there´s no substance that this fire cant burn and melt.

effects.description:
Range: +6% for Horror, Flamer, Exalted Flamer, Burning Chariot, and Soul Grinder units
	(Lord's army)

Reload Time Reduction: +6% for Horror, Flamer, Exalted Flamer, Burning Chariot, and Soul Grinder units
	(Lord's army)

Reload Time Reduction: +10% for Horror, Flamer, Exalted Flamer, Burning Chariot, and Soul Grinder units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Touched by Change
skillTree.description: They trade free will for power and eternal servitude, not knowing that until the day their cruel new master decides to let them understand it.

effects.description:
Barrier: +6% for Chaos Warrior, Cabalists, Chaos Chariots, and Tzaangor units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Attack: +4 for Chaos Warriors, Cabalists, Chaos Chariots, and Tzaangor units
	(Lord's army)

Barrier: +8% for Chaos Warrior, Cabalists, Chaos Chariots, and Tzaangor units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Attack: +6 for Chaos Warriors, Cabalists, Chaos Chariots, and Tzaangor units
	(Lord's army)

Barrier: +10% for Chaos Warrior, Cabalists, Chaos Chariots, and Tzaangor units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Attack: +8 for Chaos Warriors, Cabalists, Chaos Chariots, and Tzaangor units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: The Way to Ascension
skillTree.description: While others are killed by the energies transforming their bodies and the unfathomable secrets  burning their minds these warriors grow stronger.

effects.description:
Melee Defence: +4 for Aspiring Champions, Chaos Warshrine, Fated Ones, and Chaos Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +4% for Aspiring Champions, Chaos Warshrine, Fated Ones, and Chaos Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Defence: +6 for Aspiring Champions, Chaos Warshrine, Fated Ones, and Chaos Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +6% for Aspiring Champions, Chaos Warshrine, Fated Ones, and Chaos Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Defence: +8 for Aspiring Champions, Chaos Warshrine, Fated Ones, and Chaos Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +8% for Aspiring Champions, Chaos Warshrine, Fated Ones, and Chaos Knights units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: The Ninth Legion
skillTree.description: The Changer of Ways needs his favorite servants alive so they can be discarded once they are not needed anymore.

effects.description:
Armour: +6 for Chosen, Bearers of Change, Chosen Knights, Doom Knights, and Lords of Change units
	(Lord's army)

Barrier: +6% for Chosen, Bearers of Change, Chosen Knights, Doom Knights, and Lords of Change units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +8 for Chosen, Bearers of Change, Chosen Knights, Doom Knights, and Lords of Change units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Barrier: +10% for Chosen, Bearers of Change, Chosen Knights, Doom Knights, and Lords of Change units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Horrific Advancement
skillTree.description: Even the bravest, most rational souls waver in the hideous, laughing face of their worst nightmares.

effects.description:
Leadership: +6 for Marauders, Chaos Warshrines, Blue Horrors of Tzeentch, Pink Horrors of Tzeentch and Exalted Pink Horrors of Tzeentch units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +10% for Marauders, Chaos Warshrines, Blue Horrors of Tzeentch, Pink Horrors of Tzeentch and Exalted Pink Horrors of Tzeentch units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 10% for Marauders, Chaos Warshrines, Blue Horrors of Tzeentch, Pink Horrors of Tzeentch and Exalted Pink Horrors of Tzeentch units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Arsenal of Insanity
skillTree.description: Of the many weapons available to Tchar, derangement must surely be the greatest and most satsifying to wield.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +7% for Forsaken of Tzeentch, Spawn of Tzeentch, Lord of Change and Soul Grinder units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Bonus vs Infantry: +5 for Forsaken of Tzeentch, Spawn of Tzeentch, Lord of Change and Soul Grinder units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Spell resistance: 10% for Forsaken of Tzeentch, Spawn of Tzeentch, Lord of Change and Soul Grinder units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Incendiary Ascent
skillTree.description: The flickering beings of flame are in many ways the purest servants of the Changer, for their gaseous forms are ever in a state of flux.

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 for Flamers of Tzeentch, Exalted Flamer of Tzeentch and Burning Chariot of Tzeentch units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +14% for Flamers of Tzeentch, Exalted Flamer of Tzeentch and Burning Chariot of Tzeentch units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Spell resistance: 10% for Flamers of Tzeentch, Exalted Flamer of Tzeentch and Burning Chariot of Tzeentch units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Armour of Delirium
skillTree.description: The best form of defence is attack, and the best form of attack is the one which reaches into the foe's mind and turns its contents against them.

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for Chaos Warriors of Tzeentch, Chaos Knights of Tzeentch, Doom Knights of Tzeentch, Chaos Furies and Screamers of Tzeentch units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +5 for Chaos Warriors of Tzeentch, Chaos Knights of Tzeentch, Doom Knights of Tzeentch, Chaos Furies and Screamers of Tzeentch units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 10% for Chaos Warriors of Tzeentch, Chaos Knights of Tzeentch, Doom Knights of Tzeentch, Chaos Furies and Screamers of Tzeentch units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Serve or Die
skillTree.description: "You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

skillTree.name: Arch-Manipulator
skillTree.description: As they are a most adept and dedicated magic-user, where this one treads, the Winds always blow high and hard.

effects.description:
Chance of Winds of Magic changing in strength: +5%
	(local province)

Chance of Winds of Magic increasing in strength when changing: +5%
	(local province)

Chance of Winds of Magic changing in strength: +10%
	(local province)

Chance of Winds of Magic increasing in strength when changing: +10%
	(local province)

Chance of Winds of Magic changing in strength: +15%
	(local province)

Chance of Winds of Magic increasing in strength when changing: +15%
	(local province)

skillTree.name: Despoilers
skillTree.description: To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them - this is what Chaos wants.

skillTree.name: Corruption
skillTree.description: With the servants of Chaos comes the corruption - as the landscape twists, this one speeds the transformation.

skillTree.name: Draftmaster
skillTree.description: Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Called by Change
skillTree.description: The promise of Change, though it may amount to nothing more than the cruellest of tricks, ensures the forces of Tzeeneth are fed and nourished.

skillTree.name: Scrolls of Destiny
skillTree.description: The many faces of the Wind-lord are described here, along with all the terrible mysteries of destiny. Between these lines lurks insanity, ever waiting to trap the unwary.

skillTree.name: Legions of Madness
skillTree.description: Tzeentch knows that at their cores all beings desire Change, and as such there are no shortage of recruits willing to march under his many-coloured banner.

skillTree.name: Renowned & Feared
skillTree.description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Mystifying Miasma [HIDDEN]
backgroundSkills.description: The caster weaves a confounding fog that numbs and deludes enemies, causing them to stumble and stagger.

ui_effects.description: Strong vs 25 men unit or above

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Intelligent
backgroundSkills.description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Knowledgeable
backgroundSkills.description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Weapon Master
backgroundSkills.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Pinioned
backgroundSkills.description: Blessed with the transformative boons of Tzeeneth, this one can travel further by his feathered wings, whether they be figurative or literal.

backgroundSkills.name: Baffler
backgroundSkills.description: Beguilement and confusion are exuded wherever this servant of Change walks, foxing even the most adept combatants and magic-users.

backgroundSkills.name: Channeller
backgroundSkills.description: This one has become the conduit through which the Great Conspirator weaves His sorcerous webs, affecting glorious Change through magical means.

effects.description:
Chance of Winds of Magic increasing in strength when changing: +10%
	(local province)

backgroundSkills.name: Concatenator
backgroundSkills.description: The unseen threads by which the world is connected can be re-woven at Tzeentch's will. This one sees the patterns and how they can be manipulated.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve change: +10% when increasing

backgroundSkills.name: Corrupter
backgroundSkills.description: This one seeks to sow the seeds of confusion, dissent and dishonesty, for such are the insidious ways of the Changer.
